name: Ms. Jazz's Rhythm Workout
description:
(Note: Use full-screen or download the game for the best experience.)

Welcome to MS. JAZZ'S RHYTHM WORKOUT!

A game created by John Cervantes for DMD 2542

You play as a strange little alien Creature of indeterminate origin, who decides to sign up for a jazzercise class to study humanity.

But here's the problem-- you don't have a single dancing bone(?) in your body!! All you have are two left feet(?)!

Luckily, five-time national dance champion and professional jazzercise instructor/philanthropist/celebrity Ms. Jazz decides to help you out! Just follow her lead!

GAMEPLAY:

You have four buttons, each one representing a different exercise dance: a high kick, a step, a hip thrust, and a lunge.

Ms. Jazz will bust a move, and you have to repeat it by pressing that move's button.

Each turn, Ms. Jazz will add a new move to the sequence. Do your best to remember all the steps exactly!

But don't forget, this is also a dance class! You must feel the rhythm!

Press a button to the beat of the music, and you'll gain bonus points.

Do that multiple times in a row, and you'll rack up a SYNC COMBO bonus that snowballs points!

But be careful! Get even one step of the dance wrong, and you fall flat on your face!

You can reset your high scores in the main menu if you'd like.

CREDITS:

BGM "Funk Beat" by eliot-beats - https://freesound.org/people/eliot-beats/sounds/538719/

Lose sound effect by cabled_mess - https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/350985/

All other sounds and voicelines created from my mouth.

All sprites, artwork and animation created by me!
